00022 #ifndef TNT_FORTRAN_ARRAY2D_H
00023 #define TNT_FORTRAN_ARRAY2D_H

00025 #include <cstdlib>

00032 #include "tnt_array2d.h"

00034 namespace TNT
00035 {
00036 
00062 template <class T>
00063 class Fortran_Array2D 
00064 {
00065 
00066 
00067   private: 
00068                 /* For an (mxn) array, we internally keep an (nxm) "transposed"
00069                    C array and access A(i,j) as A[j-1][i-1].  The "-1" operation
00070                    is inlined in a tight loop and should be easily optimized.
00071                 */
00072                 Array2D<T> A_;
00073 
00074   public:
00075 
00076     typedef         T   value_type;
00077 
00078                Fortran_Array2D();
00079                Fortran_Array2D(int m, int n);
00080                Fortran_Array2D(int m, int n,  T *a);
00081                Fortran_Array2D(int m, int n, const T &a);
00082     inline Fortran_Array2D(const Fortran_Array2D &A);
00083         inline Fortran_Array2D & operator=(const T &a);
00084         inline Fortran_Array2D & operator=(const Fortran_Array2D &A);
00085         inline Fortran_Array2D & ref(const Fortran_Array2D &A);
00086                Fortran_Array2D copy();
00087                    Fortran_Array2D & inject(const Fortran_Array2D & A);
00088         inline T& operator()(int i, int j);
00089         inline const T& operator()(int i, int j) const ;
00090         inline int dim1() const;
00091         inline int dim2() const;
00092         inline int ref_count() const;
00093                ~Fortran_Array2D();
00094 
00095 
00096 };
00097

00102 Fortran_Array2D<T>::Fortran_Array2D() : A_() {}

00112 Fortran_Array2D<T>::Fortran_Array2D(const Fortran_Array2D<T> &A) : A_(A.A_) {}

00128 Fortran_Array2D<T>::Fortran_Array2D(int m, int n) : A_(n,m) {}

00142 Fortran_Array2D<T>::Fortran_Array2D(int m, int n, const T &val) : A_(n, m, val) {}

00160 Fortran_Array2D<T>::Fortran_Array2D(int m, int n, T *a) : A_(n, m, a) {}

00172 template <class T>
00173 inline T& Fortran_Array2D<T>::operator()(int i, int j) 
00174 { 
00175 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00176         assert(j >= 1);
00177         assert(j <= A_.dim1());
00178         assert(i >= 1);
00179         assert(i <= A_.dim2());
00180 #endif
00181 
00182         return A_[j-1][i-1]; 
00183 
00184 }
00185 
00193 template <class T>
00194 inline const T& Fortran_Array2D<T>::operator()(int i, int j)  const
00195 { 
00196 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00197         assert(j >= 1);
00198         assert(j <= A_.dim1());
00199         assert(i >= 1);
00200         assert(i <= A_.dim2());
00201 #endif
00202 
00203         return A_[j-1][i-1]; 
00204 
00205 }

00211 template <class T>
00212 Fortran_Array2D<T> & Fortran_Array2D<T>::operator=(const T &a)
00213 {
00214         A_ = a;
00215         return *this;
00216 }
00223 template <class T>
00224 Fortran_Array2D<T> Fortran_Array2D<T>::copy()
00225 {
00226 
00227         Fortran_Array2D B;
00228         
00229         B.A_= A_.copy();
00230         return B;
00231 }

00257 template <class T>
00258 Fortran_Array2D<T> & Fortran_Array2D<T>::inject(const Fortran_Array2D &A)
00259 {
00260         A_.inject(A.A_);
00261 
00262         return *this;
00263 }

00279 template <class T>
00280 Fortran_Array2D<T> & Fortran_Array2D<T>::ref(const Fortran_Array2D<T> &A)
00281 {
00282         A_.ref(A.A_);
00283         return *this;
00284 }

00289 template <class T>
00290 Fortran_Array2D<T> & Fortran_Array2D<T>::operator=(const Fortran_Array2D<T> &A)
00291 {
00292         return ref(A);
00293 }

00298 template <class T>
00299 inline int Fortran_Array2D<T>::dim1() const { return A_.dim2(); }

00304 template <class T>
00305 inline int Fortran_Array2D<T>::dim2() const { return A_.dim1(); }
